00010         public:

00013                 void Reset();                           // resets timer
00014                 virtual ~MricpTimer();
00015                 /* Synchronize the loop within a period
00016                  * To use this u will have to initialize the timer
00017                  * reset the timer at the beginning of the loop
00018                  * and call the Synch function at the end of the loop
00019                  */
